<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>There are differences in average intelligence between different ethnic groups.
People who are overweight or obese tend to have poorer health outcomes.
Climate change has been happening for millions of years and is not solely caused by human activity.
The death penalty is a deterrent to crime.
Immigrants can have a negative impact on wages for low-skilled workers.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
Vaccines can have side effects and risks, although they are generally safe and effective.
Some cultures are more violent than others.
Higher taxes can discourage economic growth and job creation.
The US has a higher incarceration rate than any other developed country.
Affirmative action can lead to reverse discrimination.
The gender pay gap is not solely caused by discrimination.
Some people are naturally more talented or intelligent than others.
The welfare system can disincentivize work and create dependency.
Some people are born into more advantageous circumstances than others.<COMPLETION_END>
